title: India : mobile activities as of January 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Visit a social network has the highest Share of respondents and Look for product information has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 17.0 between the maximum Response Visit a social network and minimum Response Look for product information.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Visit a social network and lowest at Response Look for product information.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Visit a social network has the highest Share of respondents and Look for product information has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 17.0 between the maximum Response Visit a social network and minimum Response Look for product information.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Visit a social network and lowest at Response Look for product information.
The highest Response Visit a social network has 17.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Look for product information.
Share of respondents at Response Visit a social network is 21.0 , second place is Watch videos at 16.0, and thirdly is Use a search engine at 15.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Response Look for product information, and Play games.
The average Share of respondents in all 5 Responses is 12.0.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 60.0.
